data.message: Listen Facebook, I have tried three times it get information from you. I have missing posts (about two weeks worth) from my page. I ant to retrieve them but don't know how. Please help me. My 3 month old grandson died in June. My daughter and I would like the postings and all the comments retrieved. I have no idea how to retrieve them. Does anyone know how to get in touch with Facebook?

replies.message: Hi Mary McCartan Konwinski. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing issues. Please fill out the Report Missing Photos or Albums form at: http://on.fb.me/1fGJ9da  -Ryan
I filled it out before, but did it again today. I hope you can help. It's very important to my family.
Facebook I used 60$ in my old account and you close it because i am 13 years old.. What i will do now?
